name: Bullet Tracks II
description: In the future, 15 weaponized androids were created for the intentions of defending the world. These androids were called Hyper Weapons, and each had their own heavy weapon machine. Everything went perfectly, until an uprising of 5 Hyper Weapons caused infighting within their forces. They defeated the 9 other Hyper Weapons soon threatened to rule over humanity. With the other Hyper Weapons defeated, Mist, Hyper Weapon No.1, decides to awaken from her slumber. With her tank, RiskBuster MKII, she ventures out to stop the rebellion.
